content: these little flower pouches come in three sizes and are useful for holding all sorts of things each pouch is knitted flat in four garter stitch pieces which are then sewn together drawstrings pull them closed you will need two shades of dk weight yarn one for the petals and one for the body of the pouch they take between 20 and 60g of yarn all together depending on which size you are knitting all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
